name: Gamble Scramble
description:
Play it offline by buying it on the Google Play Store! Or download from here!

Pick your amount of chips, then match up 5 pieces to make a poker hand! Play until you run out of chips and go for the highest score possible! Earn chips by matching all of the same symbol!

Possible Hands (From lowest to highest scoring):

Two of a Kind

Three of a Kind

Two Pairs

Four of a Kind

Full House (2 and 3 of a kind)

Straight (Get numbers in order, or in ascending value)

Five of a Kind

Royal Flush (10, J, Q, K, A)
